Html:
Hi,

Im new to Goblin XNA and I would like to know if its possible to fire an event when the rendered 3D Object is collided with the user's hand. Im building a guitar learning tool and I will be displaying the note to play on the guitar using Goblin XNA. I need to know if the user's hand is closer to the note to play so I can display the next note to play. 

I hope I made my self clear and any help would be much appreciated.

Kind Regards,

Janidu

We will add a tutorial on using OpenCV with Goblin XNA in the next release, so you can probably do finger tracking using OpenCV.

Ohan

Thanks :) . Looking forward to the new release. When is the next version planned to be released.

Janidu

end of March to early April. Same time for Goblin XNA 4.0 release.

Ohan
